comments:
Steve Chernicoff game 3.
First game of Season 11.
First show taped at Sony Pictures Studios and produced by Columbia TriStar Television.

clues.text: The U.S. Coast Guard intercepted over 3,000 refugees on boats from this country

rounds.text: Of all the cities that have hosted the Winter Olympics, this one is the farthest north
